SELECT DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate) AS year,
TxnDate AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Week,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Month,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate) AS txnDate,
sum(DebitNum) as consumptionPerson ,sum(DebitAmount) as consumptionAmount ,SUM (DebitFreeNum) AS debitFreeNum ,SUM (DebitFreeAmount) AS debitFreeAmount ,b.BusNo as BusNo FROM BAR_DailySummary_Debit d LEFT JOIN OPT_Terminal t ON t.TerminalNO = d.TerminalNO LEFT JOIN OPT_Bus b ON b.ID = t.BusID
and d.TxnDate BETWEEN #{startDate} AND #{endDate} and b.BusNo = #{busNO} and b.MerchantCode = #{merchantCode}
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), TxnDate, BusNo
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Week,TxnDate), BusNo
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Month,TxnDate), BusNo
GROUP BY DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate), BusNo
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), TxnDate DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Week,TxnDate) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Month,TxnDate) DESC
order by DATEPART(YEAR, TxnDate), DATEPART(Quarter,TxnDate) desc
